main.name: Hadi Chami
main.description: with 8+ years of Professional Development Experience
main.bio: I'm a Senior Software Developer with over eight years of professional development and management experience. Experienced in building end-user applications in multiple languages, environments, and architectures.

education.school: University of North Carolina at Charlotte

work.title: Developer Support Manager
work.description: Responsible for managing multiple departments. Designed and developed multiple projects while managing the departments. Created project plans, scope documents, statement of works, schedules, and forecasts. Developed best practices and tools for project execution and management. Advised other departments as a subject matter expert in various technical areas.

work.title: Developer Support Engineer
work.description: Supported customer development projects over 5 different programming languages. Assisted with development on internal utilities and projects to increase productivity and efficiency.
